alert.note: Alert for Okfuskee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 3:57AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Okfuskee County through 430 AM CDT... At 356 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bearden to 7 miles southeast of Cromwell to 4 miles northwest of Yeager. Movement was east northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Weleetka... Bearden... Clearview... Pharoah... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CDT for northeastern and east central Oklahoma.
